text: Ara smarana kara, yakhana tomara chile alpa, parajita abasthaya parechile dese; bhita-sastrastra chile ye, tomadera na an'yera chom mere niye yaya. Atahpara tini tomadigake asrayera thikana diyechena, sbiya sahayyera dbara tomadigake sakti dana karechena ebam paricchanna jibika diyechena yate tomara sukariya adaya kara.
